DOC.criteria: All male patient undergo ultrasound guide prostate biopsy due one following : Raised prostatespecific antigen level ( > 4.0ng/ml ) palpable nodularity digital rectal examination Palpable nodularity digital rectal examination Hypo echoic lesion compare surround prostate transrectal ultrasound History previous prostate biopsy Acute and/or chronic prostatitis chronic pelvic pain syndrome Anal fissure , hemorrhoid , anal surgery Concomitant analgesic medication Chronic renal failure Allergy diclofenac
